E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 8/26/1973
Subject: Progress of John Candelaria
Dear Sir,
John Candelaria has an ERA of 3.51 at AA Asheville Orioles!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 8/26/1973
Subject: Progress of Dave Hamilton
Dear Sir,
Dave Hamilton is doing pretty good at AA Asheville Orioles!
He has an ERA of 3.09, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
